# Load Dataset

```{r}
library(baseballr)

bref_standings_on_date("2022-07-06", "AL East", from = FALSE)

statcast_data <- statcast_search_batters("2022-04-01", "2022-07-06")
```
```{r}
head(statcast_data)
```
